@baldevdesai9 my fav. Kishoreda number is 'yeh kya hua kaise hua' though there r so many really to choose from! He was a true genius!
I sang for Jaidevji in many movies & many non-film albums. My fav. song from d non-film repertoire is 'jhaljhali aankha ma'
Jaidevji is one of my all-time favorite composers.Just yesterday was his birth anniversary. V all miss him. I was lucky to have sung for him
My most popular duet with him is 'chhattri na khol'.
The 1st song duet that i ever sang with him was 'aaja raat beeti jaaye'
column4: & he was so helpful to a new artiste like me.
